content_depth.description: Pages must have substantial, valuable content

author_credentials.description: Clear author identification and expertise demonstration

unique_value.description: Content must provide unique value beyond existing sources

technical_seo.description: Proper meta tags, structured data, sitemap

priority_actions: Enhance About page with detailed company information and team credentials

Add user testimonials and success stories

Add detailed privacy policy and terms of service
Enhance contact page with multiple contact methods
